ygData.subject: Re: Location of Runes
ygData.msgSnippet: Rune locations are pretty much random. ... research.  Please keep the emails on topic.
ygData.messageBody:
Rune locations are pretty much random.


At 09:17 AM 5/13/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: Cristie <cristie@...>
>
>There is also rune of proximity and I had one a while back from east
>commons area, think it was on a wisp. I don't really recall...didn't know
>what it was for at the time and accidentally sold it...oops.
>
>
>At 10:58 AM 5/13/99 -0500, you wrote:
>>From: "Robin McCaig" <twister@...>
>>
